Anan Charoenchasri | total_type = | unit_pref = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 22.2 | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | area_water_percent = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | elevation_max_m = | elevation_min_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 107,406 | population_as_of = 2010 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_note = Registered residents only | timezone = ICT | utc_offset = +7 | timezone_DST = | utc_offset_DST = | postal_code_type = | postal_code = 20150 | area_code = | blank_name = ISO 3166-2 | blank_info = TH-S | website = www.pattaya.go.th | footnotes = }} Pattaya (, ) is a city in Thailand. It is on the east coast of the Gulf of Thailand, about 165 km southeast of Bangkok. ==Tourism== In 2016, 65% of the tourists (coming to the city) were foreigners. Of foreigners there were most Chinese, followed by Russians, and then by Koreans, and then by Indians, and then by Germans. ==References== Category:Cities in Thailand
title: Pattaya
